nodes.text: An Imperial medical spice cache was located on Gargon, a mountainous planet settled by the Old Mandalorians. It contained medicinally processed spice that was segmented into ready-to-implement triage kits and emergency packs, as well as raw spice. In the year 11 BBY, the marauder Enfys Nest and her Cloud-Riders raided the cache for its medicinally processed spice, leaving the raw spice behind.
